definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) thick-billed flowerpecker (Dicaeum agile)
flowerpecker (any bird of the family Dicaeidae)
(bird species of China) scarlet-backed flowerpecker (Dicaeum cruentatum)
(bird species of China) fire-breasted flowerpecker (Dicaeum ignipectus)
(bird species of China) plain flowerpecker (Dicaeum minullum)
(bird species of China) yellow-vented flowerpecker (Dicaeum chrysorrheum)
(bird species of China) yellow-bellied flowerpecker (Dicaeum melanoxanthum)

sentences.english: On the inside is a traditional Chinese painting of flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 裏邊畫的是一幅中國傳統花鳥畫。

sentences.english: He resumed painting secretly, and went sketching in Zhongshan Park, painting flower-and-bird volumes.
sentences.chinese: 開始悄悄作畫，去中山公園寫生，作花鳥冊頁等。

sentences.english: The fifth part is the paintings of flowers, birds, grass, insects.
Such are the Feelings of a person who has just watched Mr.
sentences.chinese: 楊玉琪先生的花鳥畫所給人的感覺正是如此。

sentences.english: Its influence on the Flower-bird paining in Chongqing has been lasted until present.
sentences.chinese: 重慶的花鳥畫也受其影響持續至今。

sentences.english: The good works of flowers and birds painted flowers and birds in the natural environment, wild look.
sentences.chinese: 其花鳥作品長於在天然情況中描繪花鳥的神情野趣。

sentences.english: The good works of flowers and birds painted flowers and birds in the natural environment, wild look.
sentences.chinese: 其花鳥作品長於在天然情況中描繪花鳥的神情野趣。

sentences.english: Mr. Su Baozhen is a famous artist painting flowers-and-birds in our country.
sentences.chinese: 蘇葆楨先生是我國著名的花鳥畫家。

sentences.english: Flower-and-bird painting, landscape painting, figure painting were in a tripartite balance in the Tang period.
sentences.chinese: 唐代的花鳥畫與山水畫同人物畫鼎足而立。

sentences.english: The background is pale blue with traditional Chinese paintings of flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 底色是淺藍的，另有中國花鳥畫。

sentences.english: Probably an immature male Scarlet-backed Flowerpecker.
sentences.chinese: 可能是未成年的雄性朱背啄花鳥吧。

sentences.english: The flower-and-bird painting was executed with great delicacy.
sentences.chinese: 那幅花鳥畫畫得很工緻。

sentences.english: The background is pale blue with Chinese paintings of flowers and birds.
sentences.chinese: 淡藍色底紋的中國傳統花鳥畫。

sentences.english: " Chen Yongkang flower and bird paintings has published many books".
sentences.chinese: 出版有《陳永康花鳥畫集》多冊。

sentences.english: Contemporary China flowers and birds painting is that one be diverse to with each other repair of organic dynamic state structure system.
sentences.chinese: 當代中國花鳥畫是一個多元互補的有機動態結構系統。

definition: to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
gongbi, traditional Chinese painting method characterized by meticulous brush technique and detailed description
Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
